Text: Thanks again Charles!  If your kind offer is still open, could you possibly find Torchwood s04e04 (out on Sat in the US)? The ones here are either too small or too large.  I think BoB does a reenc, if that's any help. No problem if not, and thanks anyway!

Sorry, in case I wasn't clear, it's out in 2 days time, so don't look for it yet!!

 Thanks again for all the uploads, much appreciated!
